# Greater Alien Surge
## Overview
***The following spell is available to [[Colliatur|colliatur]] spellcasters at the GMâ€™s discretion.***

**Level**: 6th
#Spell-Level/6th

**School**: Transmutation
#Spell-School/Transmutation

**Casting Time**: 1 action or 1 reaction, taken after breaking off a weapon from your body with the [[Jack-in-the-Limb|Jack-in- the-Limb]] feat

**Range**: Touch

**Components**: V, S, M (gem fragments, caster must use the [[Jack-in-the-Limb]] feat to break off 1 gp of crystal from his body)

**Duration**: 1 hour

## Effects
You can touch the creature to temporarily make it look almost like a [[Colliatur|colliatur]], conferring the benefits of *[[Alien Surge|alien surge]]*, but also that of your [[Jack-in-the-Limb]] feat to the creature touched. Tools or weapons created by the creature touched vanish upon the spell ending, though the exhaustion incurred by the target creature remains.
